page.title: 19Leisure Activities
page.content: There is a good Community Centre in Llanrwst used for badminton, Young Farmers, stage productions. Senior citizens may have meals at lunch time. There are three senior football teams and various age teams, a bowls club, a British Legion,a Rotary Club and Inner Wheel, a Ladies Circle, a Cine Club, Mother's Discussion Group,Merched y Wawr, Women's Institute, Clwb Yr Efail (Debating Society), Chamber Music Society,a Mutual Society and organisations for young people such as Scouts and Cubs, Guides and Brownies, Red Cross and Cadets. Choirs of all ages are attached to churches & chapels. Three hotels with music licences cater for wedding receptions,dinners and group events and provide family entertainment. They do not hold discos because of the problem of under-age drinking & noise.
